pullRequest.title: Fail parsing dates beyond a representable range

nodes.bodyText: This should be INVALID_CAST_ARGUMENT as well

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,6 +106,7 @@
     NULL_TREATMENT_NOT_ALLOWED(83, USER_ERROR),
     INVALID_ROW_FILTER(84, USER_ERROR),
     INVALID_COLUMN_MASK(85, USER_ERROR),
+    DATE_OUT_OF_RANGE(86, USER_ERROR),            // caught by TRY

nodes.bodyText: What happens if we exceed long range in DateTimeUtils parseDate?
Can you also include a test case when value fails within DATE_FORMATTER.parseMillis(value) method (due to overflow)?

commit.message: Fail parsing dates beyond a representable range

afterCommit.message: Fail parsing dates beyond a representable range
